original_title: Fuel shortages lead to queues at fuel stations
original_body_lines: Today, long queues were observed at numerous fuel stations as a consequence of several stations refraining from placing orders in anticipation of a potential reduction in fuel prices.
Photographs captured by Kushan Pathiraja depict the long queues of vehicles outside the affected fuel stations, painting a vivid picture of the challenges faced by both motorists and fuel retailers.
